name: J.J. 汤姆孙
bio_short: 英国物理学家，因发现“电子”（`thomson_electron_1897`）而获得了1906年的诺贝尔物理学奖。他证明了原子的可分割性，并提出了“葡萄干布丁模型”。
bio_short_en: A British physicist who won the 1906 Nobel Prize for his discovery of the 'electron' (`thomson_electron_1897`). He proved the atom was divisible and proposed the 'plum pudding model'.
